analysis.description:
DefaultSweeper.sweep (/unique_chucks/28/0xe030fc55a27b2d1d84f34336fca3a276a6ddf0d4.sol#148-180) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- success = destination.send(amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/28/0xe030fc55a27b2d1d84f34336fca3a276a6ddf0d4.sol#169-174)
